lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Sasha Sloan/Henry Agincourt Allen/Emi Dragoi
[00:00.778] 作词 : Sasha Sloan/Henry Agincourt Allen/Emi Dragoi
[00:02.336]Don't sleep on the couch again
[00:04.673]Even though you took it for the weekend
[00:11.558]Kiss me like you wanna stay
[00:13.990]Even though you're thinking about leaving
[00:19.726]Please just fake it
[00:21.853]Pretend to look when I'm naked
[00:24.187]Don't be honest
[00:26.386]Promise me that you want this
[00:28.691]Say you're lucky
[00:30.974]Say you're lucky to love me like you used to
[00:36.654]Even if it isn't true
[00:38.425]I want you to
[00:39.767]Lie, lie
[00:41.889]Right to my face
[00:43.128]I want you to
[00:44.520]Put, your, hands on my waist
[00:48.005]Can we just dance 'til the skies are white?
[00:52.622]'Cause I really can't get my heart broken tonight
[00:57.023]I want you to show me there's a future here
[01:00.091]Even if you've never really seen it
[01:06.947]Tell me when you close your eyes I'm all you see, even if you're not dreamin‘
[01:15.045]Please just fake it
[01:17.197]Pretend to look when I'm naked
[01:19.420]Don't be honest
[01:21.720]Promise me that you want this
[01:24.098]Say you're lucky
[01:26.223]Say you're lucky to love me like you used to
[01:31.978]Even if it isn't true
[01:33.740]I want you to
[01:35.072]Lie, lie
[01:36.956]Right to my face
[01:38.478]I want you to
[01:39.856]Put, your, hands on my waist
[01:43.396]Can we just dance 'til the skies are white?
[01:47.832]'Cause I really can't get my heart broken tonight
[01:52.337]I want you to
[01:55.390]Touch me like you did in the beginning
[01:59.976]Baby just give me another day
[02:04.573]Touch me like there isn't something missing
[02:08.672]'Cause even if you don't stay
[02:10.772]I want you to
[02:12.143]Lie, lie
[02:14.106]Right to my face
[02:15.404]I want you to
[02:16.631]Put, your, hands on my waist
[02:20.193]Can we just dance 'til the skies are white?
[02:24.823]'Cause I really can't get my heart broken tonight
[02:29.295]I want you to
[02:30.622]Lie, lie
[02:32.510]Right to my face
[02:33.761]I want you to
[02:35.164]Put, your, hands on my waist
[02:38.639]Can we just dance 'til the skies are white?
[02:43.349]'Cause I really can't get my heart broken tonight
[02:47.941]I want you to
[02:50.742]Touch me like you did in the beginning
[02:55.415]Baby just give me another day
[02:59.817]Touch me like there isn't something missing
[03:04.258]'Cause even if you don't stay
[03:06.371]I want you to lie, lie, lie
[03:15.670]I want you to lie, lie, lie
tlyric:
[00:02.336]别再睡沙发上了
[00:04.673]即便你如同过周末一般闲适度过
[00:11.558]如若你企图留下那样 尽情亲吻我吧
[00:13.990]即便你正考虑着离开
[00:19.726]请戴上你假惺惺的面具
[00:21.853]在我赤裸面对你时 请佯装对我很感兴趣吧
[00:24.187]也别对我实话实说
[00:26.386]只需向我承诺 你真心想和我更加亲密
[00:28.691]和我说你自己如此幸运
[00:30.974]能够像曾经那般真心沦陷于我
[00:36.654]即便这一切都只是假象
[00:38.425]我多么希望你能够
[00:39.767]谎言满天飞
[00:41.889]虚伪对我说着谎
[00:43.128]我多么希望你能够
[00:44.520]将双手放于我腰间
[00:48.005]我们能否纵情共舞直至天将明
[00:52.622]因为今夜我不愿再心碎欲绝
[00:57.023]我希望你向我描绘未来的蓝图
[01:00.091]即便你永远无法看清
[01:06.947]请告诉我当你轻闭双眼时脑海中只有我的存在 即便并非于梦中所见
[01:15.045]请戴上你假惺惺的面具

[02:04.573]毫无顾忌留恋得触摸我
[02:08.672]因为即便你并不会为我驻足

[02:59.817]轻抚我犹如依旧对我迷恋
